languages.text: {n}Гибкое тело напрягается в попытке унять дрожь отчаяния.{/n} "Мне понятны твои сомнения, элантах. Я лишь прошу обдумать мою просьбу... И сделать это не ради моих собратьев, Аребенниана или кого-то еще. Но ради меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Гибкое тело напрягается в попытке унять дрожь отчаяния.{/n} "Мне понятны твои сомнения, элантах. Я лишь прошу обдумать мою просьбу... И сделать это не ради моих собратьев, Аребенниана или кого-то еще. Но ради меня".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Гибкое тело напрягается в попытке унять дрожь отчаяния.{/n} "Мне понятны твои сомнения, элантах. Я лишь прошу обдумать мою просьбу... И сделать это не ради моих собратьев, Аребенниана или кого-то еще. Но ради меня".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特绷紧了她轻盈的身躯，试图掩饰住绝望的颤抖。{/n}“我理解你的疑虑，外界人。我仅仅是希望你能考虑我的请求……这么做并不是为了我的族人，也不是为了独角，甚至不是为了其他任何人，仅仅是为了我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特绷紧了她轻盈的身躯，试图掩饰住绝望的颤抖。{/n}“我理解你的疑虑，外界人。我仅仅是希望你能考虑我的请求……这么做并不是为了我的族人，也不是为了独角，甚至不是为了其他任何人，仅仅是为了我。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet tensa su ágil cuerpo para tratar de contener el escalofrío de desesperación que la atraviesa.{/n} «Entiendo tus dudas, elantach. Solo pido que consideres mi petición... y no por el bien de mi pueblo, por el Arebennian ni por nadie más. Por mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tensa su ágil cuerpo para tratar de contener el escalofrío de desesperación que la atraviesa.{/n} «Entiendo tus dudas, elantach. Solo pido que consideres mi petición... y no por el bien de mi pueblo, por el Arebennian ni por nadie más. Por mí».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしなやかな体躯を緊張させ、絶望に身体が乗っ取られるのを抑えようとした。{/n}「あなたが疑う気持ちはわかる、エランタ。でも、もう一度我が頼みについて考えてほしい…血族のためやアーベニアンのためではなく、我のためにするのだと思ってほしい」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしなやかな体躯を緊張させ、絶望に身体が乗っ取られるのを抑えようとした。{/n}「あなたが疑う気持ちはわかる、エランタ。でも、もう一度我が頼みについて考えてほしい…血族のためやアーベニアンのためではなく、我のためにするのだと思ってほしい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet spannt ihren drahtigen Körper an — ein Versuch, das Schaudern der Verzweiflung zu unterdrücken, das sie durchfährt.{/n} "Ich verstehe Eure Zweifel, Elantach. Ich bitte nur darum, dass Ihr meine Bitte in Erwägung zieht ... und es nicht für mein Volk tut, für die Arebennian oder für sonst jemanden. Sondern für mich."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet spannt ihren drahtigen Körper an — ein Versuch, das Schaudern der Verzweiflung zu unterdrücken, das sie durchfährt.{/n} "Ich verstehe Eure Zweifel, Elantach. Ich bitte nur darum, dass Ihr meine Bitte in Erwägung zieht ... und es nicht für mein Volk tut, für die Arebennian oder für sonst jemanden. Sondern für mich."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La silhouette élancée d'Yrliet se contracte pour tenter de contenir le frisson de désespoir qui la parcourt.{/n} « Je comprends vos doutes, elantach. Je vous demande simplement de prendre ma demande en considération... et d'agir non pas pour mon peuple, pour l'Arebennian ou pour qui que ce soit d'autre, mais pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette élancée d'Yrliet se contracte pour tenter de contenir le frisson de désespoir qui la parcourt.{/n} « Je comprends vos doutes, elantach. Je vous demande simplement de prendre ma demande en considération... et d'agir non pas pour mon peuple, pour l'arebennian ou pour qui que ce soit d'autre, mais pour moi. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, kıvrak vücudundaki kasları sıkarak içini saran ümitsizlik dalgasını bastırmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Aklındaki kuşkuları anlayabiliyorum elantach. Ricamı göz önünde tutmanı istiyorum sadece... Bunu soydaşlarım, Arebennian veya bir başkası için değil; benim için yapmanı istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet tenses her lithe frame in an attempt to hold back the shudder of despair that rocks through her.{/n} "I understand your doubts, elantach. I but ask you to consider my request... and to do it not for my kin, for the Arebennian, or for anyone else. But for me."

Ricamı göz önünde tutmanı istiyorum sadece... Bunu soydaşlarım, Arebennian veya bir başkası için değil; benim için yapmanı istiyorum."
